Description:
You see a group of herons taking sand from inside a pyramid. When you get closer, one of them tells you:

"Welcome and let me tell you something about us. Many generations ago, our ancestors made a big mistake in these pyramids. After several decades, they regretted it, but it was too late... To do penance, it is now our duty to protect and keep taking care of these pyramids.

By the way, a few days ago, the ancient Obelisk was activated and shook the desert. The entrance to the catacombs is blocked by sand and we are currently removing it.
DescriptionAction: Is there anything we can do for you?"

    "SSRewardText": "The herons can't believe their eyes when they see Navalea. Stunned and surprised, the herons gather around her and prostrate themselves before her.\n\nNavalea repeats that she forgives them, that they have done enough penance since it was not their fault. Their ancestors only followed Basthet's orders and could have done little else.\n\nWhile you rest, one of the herons tells Navalea that they have left a hidden trail in the sand that comes out of the top of the Obelisk.  If she follows the trail she will reach a quicksand that will lead her to a secret chamber in the catacombs below.",

    "SSRewardText": "The herons realize that the feline speaking is none other than Laia, Basthet’s current champion. They grow nervous about what might happen next, but Laia quickly deescalates the situation.\r\n\n(Laia): “We are on a mission, and if you have supplies to spare, we may be interested in purchasing them. You should seek Basthet’s forgiveness, and I’m sure that if you offer us a good deal, it will be a great start for you.”\r\n\nThe herons don’t want any trouble and show you what they have for sale, offering a 10% discount.",
